GetAclineEnds.Remark: 根据交流线路id获取交流线端id

ROOT.GetAclineEnds: SELECT ID,LINE_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_ACLINEEND_B WHERE LINE_ID IN ({0})

GetDclineEnds.Remark: 根据直流线路id获取直流线端id

ROOT.GetDclineEnds: SELECT ID,LINE_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_DCLINEEND_B WHERE LINE_ID IN ({0})

GetTransfmwds.Remark: 根据变压器id获取高压侧绕组id

ROOT.GetTransfmwds: select w.id as wid,t.id as tid from sg_dev_transfmwd_b w JOIN sg_dev_pwrtransfm_b t ON w.transfm_id=t.id and w.voltage_type=t.voltage_type where t.id IN ({0})
